Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Central Park/Cermak
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Central Park, Cermak, Kedzie, 25th, and Central Park due to, construction at Central Park/Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central Park, Cermak, Kedzie, 25th, and Central Park due to, construction at Central Park/Cermak.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Update: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute near Damen/Lake
ShortDescription: Update: 50 Damen buses temp. rerouted SB: Damen, Grand, Ashland, Washington, and Damen; NB: Damen, Warren, Ashland, Grand, and Damen near Damen/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions,  due to street blockage near Damen/Lake.

Southbound buses will operate via Damen, Grand, Ashland, Washington, and Damen.

Northbound buses will operate via Damen, Warren, Ashland, Grand, and Damen.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Update: #49 Western Temporary Southbound Reroute near Damen/Lake
ShortDescription: Update: SB 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Grand, Ashland, Washington, and Western due to, street blockage near Damen/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Grand, Ashland, Washington, and Western due to, street blockage near Damen/Lake.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kedzie/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Southbound 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Roosevelt, Homan, Douglas, and Kedzie due to, street blockage near Kedzie/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Roosevelt, Homan, Douglas, and Kedzie due to, street blockage near Kedzie/Roosevelt.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute near Madison/Damen
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses temporarily rerouted Eastbound: Madison, Damen, Warren, Ashland, and Madison; Westbound: Madison, Ashland, Washington, Damen, and Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Madison/Damen.

Eastbound buses will operate via Madison, Damen, Warren, Ashland, and Madison.

Westbound buses will operate via Madison, Ashland, Washington, Damen, and Madison.

Allow extra travel time.
